PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2015-04702015-04-30HC,  ,  ,  , 
ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectExemption Regulations (Consumer Products)
PrecisEXEMPTION REGULATIONS (CONSUMER PRODUCTS) in order to exempt retailers from the requirements to prepare and maintain documents established under subparagraph 13(1)(a)(i) of the Canada Consumer Product Safety Act in respect of a consumer product they obtain by donation from persons other than those who are or were engaged in the business of manufacturing, importing or selling of such consumer products.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2015-0097 Publication Date: 2015-05-20
AttachmentsAttachment
